channel.title: Drive Mirroring
channel.description: OK, so I bought a new drive to replace the old 10 gig one on my subversion server. I would just set up a raid array, but there is only one drive bay, and I don't want to have the drive sitting on top of the case permanently. Will mirroring the old drive to the new drive with dd, boot sector and all, just work? Of course I will have to resize the partition to fill up the new disk, but that is relatively easy.
